name: chrome-collect
description: 浏览器本地收藏插件 - 一键静态化保存网页

scripts.build:app: bun run build:web && powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force packages/tray/static -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Copy-Item -Path packages/web/dist -Destination packages/tray/static -Recurse" && cd packages/tray && go build -ldflags='-H windowsgui -s -w' -o ../../dist/chrome-collect.exe . && cd ../..
scripts.build: bun run build:app && bun run build:ext
